tool.name: Make.shared
tool.description: Make a shared file from a list and a group
tool.command:
echo "make.shared( #if isinstance($group.datatype, $__app__.datatypes_registry.get_datatype_by_extension('mothur.groups').__class__): group="$group", #elif isinstance($group.datatype, $__app__.datatypes_registry.get_datatype_by_extension('mothur.count_table').__class__): count="$group", #end if #if $label: #set labelstring=str($label).replace(',','-') label="$labelstring", #end if #if $groups: #set groupstring=str($groups).replace(',','-') groups="$groupstring", #end if ##if $ordergroup: ## ordergroup="$ordergroup", ##end if list = "$otu" )" | sed 's/ //g' ## mothur trips over whitespace | mothur;
## move output files to correct destination prefix="$otu"; mv mothur.*.logfile "$logfile"; mv \${prefix%.dat}*.shared "$shared";

param.name: label
param.label: label - Select OTU Labels to include
param.help: By default all are included if no selection is made.

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The make.shared_ command takes a list_ and a group_ file and outputs a shared_ file, as well as a rabund_ file for each group.
.. _list: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/List_file .. _group: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Group_file .. _shared: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Shared_file .. _rabund: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Rabund_file .. _make.shared: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Make.shared
